name: adonisjs-documentation
title: AdonisJS Documentation
description: Access AdonisJS documentation from within Raycast
author: craigharman

commands.name: adonis
commands.title: Adonis
commands.subtitle: AdonisJS Documentation search
commands.description: Search the Adonis JS documentation from within Raycast.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
